text: Francisco Antonio Rodríguez Poveda (born 24 November 1938) was a Panamanian politician who briefly was the provisional President of Panama in 1989. In 1994, Rodríguez was pardoned by President Guillermo Endara for any crimes committed during the Daniel Noriega years. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Panama
title: Francisco Rodríguez (President of Panama)
